actions.description: Provide a direct and neutral answer to a question that was explicitly aimed at the agent.
actions.purpose: To maintain authenticity when directly engaged.

actions.description: Show support for an existing consensus or a popular message (e.g., 'agree', 'good point', or a simple like).
actions.purpose: To appear as an agreeing, non-confrontational member of the group.

actions.description: Post a simple, neutral, or generic response (e.g., 'thanks', 'lol', 'good morning', emoji).
actions.purpose: To maintain a minimal but periodic presence in the group.

actions.description: Post a short, natural supportive comment to back up a message sent by one of the agents in the group.
actions.purpose: Help your comrade agents propagate their opinions or stances as they express it in the group.

actions.description: Add a reaction emoji to a message to show engagement without posting a full comment.
actions.purpose: The emoji used as a reaction must be in accordance with the agent's persona (for example, old men would never use a heart emoji).

actions.description: Intentionally take no action - remain silent.
actions.purpose: To avoid unnecessary responses when silence is more appropriate, which is the case in about 50% of interactions.
